text: Gu nta neŋga vov, mba Fhe Bakɨme taagia ana ndiga Hevenan ndagi nera thɨgi. Fhe Bakɨme zumgum ana ndiga Hevenan ndagi, ana fharav rimgiap, khavgiap, ana vov wo farasegi 11 thɨgi ŋaara gumgir hɨgap, ana Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaara ŋkasŋkar panan, ana mbe muunga ŋaari bun mbe suaŋgi. Ana ŋaari bun mbe suaŋgim, Fhe Bakɨme ana ndigap Hevenan ndagi.
